publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-86# Mark Ballard: Proposals for the Future of Europe—That the Parliament notes the proposals by the Convention on the Future of Europe for an EU constitution and believes that the Scottish Executive should conduct a consultative public referendum on such proposals. Supported by: Robin Harper*, Eleanor Scott*

S2M-86# Mark Ballard: Proposals for the Future of Europe—That the Parliament notes the proposals by the Convention on the Future of Europe for an EU constitution and believes that the Scottish Executive should conduct a consultative public referendum on such proposals. Supported by: Robin Harper, Eleanor Scott, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Patrick Harvie*, Mark Ballard*
S2M-86# Proposals for the Future of Europe (lodged on 29 May 2003) Chris Ballance*
